languages.text: {n}Голос Урбенда наполняется приличествующим моменту негодованием:{/n} "Богохульные нелюди! Да покарает их племя Император за смерть своей достойной слуги, Вистенцы!"
{n}Drivestem's voice fills with appropriately measured indignation:{/n} "Profane fiends! May the Emperor smite their breed for the death of His diligent servant Vistenza!"
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Урбенда наполняется приличествующим моменту негодованием:{/n} "Богохульные нелюди! Да покарает их племя Император за смерть своей достойной слуги, Вистенцы!"

languages.text: {n}La voix de Drivestem prend un ton indigné très calculé :{/n} « Profanes ! Sacrilèges ! Que l'Empereur éradique leur peuple pour la mort de Vistenza, Sa zélée servante ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's voice fills with appropriately measured indignation:{/n} "Profane fiends! May the Emperor smite their breed for the death of His diligent servant Vistenza!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Drivestem prend un ton indigné très calculé :{/n} « Profanes ! Sacrilèges ! Que l'empereur éradique leur peuple pour la mort de Vistenza, Sa zélée servante ! »

languages.text: {n}德莱夫斯塔的声音充满了恰到好处的激愤。{/n}“那群亵渎神明的魔鬼，竟敢杀害帝皇勤劳的仆人维丝坦萨！愿帝皇让他们付出代价！”
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's voice fills with appropriately measured indignation:{/n} "Profane fiends! May the Emperor smite their breed for the death of His diligent servant Vistenza!"

traits.locale_text: {n}德莱夫斯塔的声音充满了恰到好处的激愤。{/n}“那群亵渎神明的魔鬼，竟敢杀害帝皇勤劳的仆人维丝坦萨！愿帝皇让他们付出代价！”

languages.text: {n}Drivestems Stimme füllt sich mit angemessen dosierter Entrüstung:{/n} "Profane Unholde! Möge der Imperator ihr Volk für den Tod seiner geflissentlichen Dienerin Vistenza niederstrecken!"
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's voice fills with appropriately measured indignation:{/n} "Profane fiends! May the Emperor smite their breed for the death of His diligent servant Vistenza!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestems Stimme füllt sich mit angemessen dosierter Entrüstung:{/n} "Profane Unholde! Möge der Imperator ihr Volk für den Tod seiner geflissentlichen Dienerin Vistenza niederstrecken!"

languages.text: {n}La voz de Drivestem muestra una indignación debidamente calculada:{/n} «¡Esos demonios profanos! ¡Que el Emperador fulmine a su casta por la muerte de nuestra diligente sirviente Vistenza!».
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's voice fills with appropriately measured indignation:{/n} "Profane fiends! May the Emperor smite their breed for the death of His diligent servant Vistenza!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Drivestem muestra una indignación debidamente calculada:{/n} «¡Esos demonios profanos! ¡Que el Emperador fulmine a su casta por la muerte de nuestra diligente sirviente Vistenza!».

languages.text: {n}ドライブステムの声が、ほどほどに憤りを抑えて響く。{/n}「神に背く悪魔め！皇帝よ、熱心な従者ヴィステンツァの死を想い、あの種族を駆逐してください！」
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's voice fills with appropriately measured indignation:{/n} "Profane fiends! May the Emperor smite their breed for the death of His diligent servant Vistenza!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ドライブステムの声が、ほどほどに憤りを抑えて響く。{/n}「神に背く悪魔め！皇帝よ、熱心な従者ヴィステンツァの死を想い、あの種族を駆逐してください！」

languages.text: {n}Drivestem'in sesi münasip bir kızgınlıkla doluyor.{/n} "Aşağılık zebaniler! İmparator, gayretli hizmetkârı Vistenza'nın canını alanların kökünü kurutsun!"
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's voice fills with appropriately measured indignation:{/n} "Profane fiends! May the Emperor smite their breed for the death of His diligent servant Vistenza!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem'in sesi münasip ölçülerde bir kızgınlık ile dolu:{/n} "Aşağılık yaratıklar! İmparator, gayretli hizmetkârı Vistenza'nın canını alan o canlıların kökünü kurutsun!"
